oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Even-mode multiport network model for slotted dual-band rectangular microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESHMUKH, AA
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dual-band rectangular microstrip antenna
multiport network model
even-mode network
u-slot
e-shaped microstrip antenna
rectangular microstrip antenna with a pair of slots
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An even-mode multipart network model (MNM) for rectangular microstrip antenna, which reduces computation time to evaluate the input impedance, is discussed. This concept is used to analyze various dual-band slotted antennas such as a U-slot loaded rectangular microstrip antenna, an E-shaped microstrip antenna, and a rectangular microstrip antenna with a pair of slots. (c) 2006 .
